function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to SARS-CoV-2 in hospital environments","Impact":"Potential risk of infection among healthcare workers and patients","Mitigation":"Implementing measures for disease prevention, including air ventilation and other infection control measures","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence assisted ventilation control system using fast prediction models incorporating data from ZigBee-based monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare workers and patients","Owner":"Healthcare administrators and facility management"},{"Description":"Efficacy of social distancing and ventilation in preventing the transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Infection rates arising from the COVID-19 disease","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and improving ventilation effectiveness","Technologies":"AI-assisted ventilation control system, monitoring systems to assess ventilation effectiveness","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and patients","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility management, and individuals"},{"Description":"Balancing the need for safe physical distance and efficient medium of interaction for communication","Impact":"Maintaining a balance between infection prevention and effective communication","Mitigation":"Seeking a balanced compromise to maintain safe physical distance and enable efficient communication, optimizing physical space arrangement","Technologies":"Technologies supporting non-verbal communication and remote communication, workspace optimization tools","People":"General population, professionals, and organizations","Owner":"Workspace planners, technology developers, and organizations"}]}
